Reviews.Content: I'm having the same problem as many other reviewers here: The camera worked great for the first few months, but now it doesn't work AT ALL about 40% of the time. I turn it on and get no sound, no screen. Nothing. I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Stopped Working
Reviews.Author: James K
Reviews.Content: First of all, the monitors never worked with batteries, we had to have them plugged in all the time.  There also was a lot of static, making the monitor impossible to use in our bedroom at night when we were sleeping, because it was too noisy.  We have to rely on the old school way of knowing when our baby is awake, hearing her from her room.  Then after 10 months of use (not a long time in my book, but maybe a long time in this age of cheap disposable products made in china) it just went dead.  I mean dead.  No picture, no sound, no lights-nothing.  We moved it from plug to plug, turned it off and on, let it sit for awhile and tried again.  Nothing.  The warranty on this product is 90 days, so forget a replacement.  Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Total junk
Reviews.Author: A. Whitaker
Reviews.Content: I agree with the previous reviewers comments about constant and extremely annoying buzzing, static and interference no matter how many times you try to position it in the "right" place. We tried to live with these annoyances by turning the sound off but it finally completely broke, of course after their 90 warranty. Don't waste your money!

Reviews.Title: Big Waste of money,  Very unsatisifed
Reviews.Author: M. Willard
Reviews.Content: This is great if you want to just use it for the camera.  You can see the baby good both day and night but if you use the sound part it is terrible.  Always static and interferes with all household items, we can't even use our home phone if the monitor is truned on.  And as for night time everytime you move it makes more static.  I wish I could return this item but I bought it well before baby was born so its too long of time now and I am stuck with a piece of crap.  And have to go spend more money on another monitor that will work.

Reviews.Title: 10 months of use and it's dead.
Reviews.Author: Nathan R. Cowger
Reviews.Content: I've inserted the link below to the monitor we should have purchased the first time.  The Mobi's video went out after a few months of use.  We continued to use it for audio only but at about 10 months audio died too.  I wish we had purchased the Summer Infant  model 02630 the first time.  We love it and it's well worth the extra $50.[...]

Reviews.Title: Horrible!!
Reviews.Author: wamomma "cmomma123"
Reviews.Content: I bought this item several months ago and at first it worked great. After a few months, the monitor began to have HEAVY static and was only audible when the volume is on high. In addition, the power cuts in and out constantly. I called MobiCam after my e-mail inquiries were ignored, only to have the representative tell me that they expect heavy static and that I could purchase replacement parts to solve the problem. Other than that, there was nothing they could do...their customer service is about as good as their products. Do not waste your money!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Baby Monitor!
Reviews.Author: Laura Schulz "L. Schulz"
Reviews.Content: The Mobi MobiCam Monitor is absolutely wonderful--especially for the price.  What I like most about it is that the video actually stays on and visible non-stop.  We have a different brand monitor that has the video go off after a few seconds "to save battery."  You have to push a button to see the video again for another few seconds, but ironically, the battery still dies really fast on that one.  And I like to be able to look at any time and see video.

Reviews.Title: FUNCIONA MUY BIEN
Reviews.Author: Hector Levin Shrem
Reviews.Content: El producto funciona correctamente, lo unico que podria corregir es la falta de un indicador luminoso o en pantalla de que el aparato se esta cargando

Reviews.Title: Worked great... for a month
Reviews.Author: S. Paola "I Save More so I can Shop More"
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with this monitor for about a month and then it slowly stopped working.  First it started buzzing very loudly and then the picture kept sitching from A to B on it's own and then got too static-y to see then finally no picture/no sound.  What a waste of money.  My cheap monitor is still going strong with no problems.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: DARDUDO "MAD DOG"
Reviews.Content: I GET CONSTANT STATIC FROM THIS MONITOR.  IT IS TERRIBLE.  IT IS SO ANNOYING WE DON'T EVEN USE IT ANYMORE.  IT HAS STATIC CONSTANTLY SO YOU CAN'T SLEEP WITH IT ON.  CAMERA WORKS GREAT, BUT YOU HAVE TO TURN THE SOUND OFF UNLESS YOU LIKE ANNOYING LOUD STATIC NOISE! BASICALLY IT IS A PIECE OF JUNK.  I WISH I DID NOT WASTE MY MONEY ON IT.

Reviews.Title: Go for digital instead
Reviews.Author: P. Brady
Reviews.Content: We were not happy with this monitor. The main issues are:-No mount included or available for this camera, making it hard to get a good view on the crib-Loud static each time the sound or video activates or deactivates when your child makes noise, which is especially unpleasant at night-Relatively bright LED lights on the front of the camera, which face the child and could potentially disturb him or herAfter doing some research, I would now buy a digital monitor instead because of the better signal, but either way this monitor needs some improvement.

Reviews.Title: Really *wanted* to like it...
Reviews.Author: L. Bohn
Reviews.Content: Like several other people mentioned, we were really excited about this monitor but were really disappointed when we got it.  We have a wireless internet connection in our house, and the monitor had TONS of static unless it was in one particular area of one room that is the farthest away from the wireless router.If you have a wireless connection, DO NOT get this monitor.  We also tried two more that didn't work before we finally ended up with this one:  http://www.amazon.com/Summer-Infant-Handheld-Monitor-Screen/dp/B001NAATW0/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&s;=baby-products&qid;=1267028902&sr;=8-2It works really well and has ZERO interference from the wireless network.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: C. Gaebel "Lynn"
Reviews.Content: This monitor is horrible.  I got it a few months ago because of the video stream and internet set up.  The monitor only comes in color and clear when the room is lit up and it is full of static the rest of the time.  The picture or should I say lack of when it is darker in the room is nothing but snow.  After a few months static has set in and even with just the sound you can't use it.  DO NOT BUY THIS!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy if you have internet or cell phone
Reviews.Author: jm "jm"
Reviews.Content: We got the Mobi as a gift. It works fine if the monitor and camera are in the same room, but if you want to put the monitor, in, say, another room, it does not work. The audio is too full-of-static to hear the baby.We contacted customer support and were told that, if we want to use the Mobi, we should turn off our WiFi.Someone else who has this suggested turning off all cell phones in the house, too.So, if you do not have WiFi or cell phones, you may be able to get this to work without static.

Reviews.Title: Go Digital
Reviews.Author: Freckles
Reviews.Content: **I am posting this review in several places since you can purchase the monitor and extra camera separately or as a set.  We purchased as a set**We have had the Mobicam Ultra for a couple of years for our daughter and decided to get this new system when our son was born so that we could monitor both rooms using just the one monitor.  The monitor itself has two stations and each camera gets one station.  When you set the monitor to scan these it flips back and forth about every 10 seconds between the two cameras so that you can see/hear what is going on in each room.PROS:*Does allow you to monitor two rooms at once (not simultaneously but scans on it's own).  Not all multicamera systems out there do this, they can only monitor one room at a time.*Decent sound and video quality.CONS:*The ability to choose between VOX mode and camera mode is on the camera itself which means going into baby's room to make the switch, rather defeating the purpose of the monitor.  The Ultra had this setting on the monitor so I could keep it on voice activation mode all the time and then switch over real quick if I just wanted to make sure she was still in bed etc.  This was a big deal for me because when I switched to camera mode in the Ultra I was even able to hear her breathing and feel reassured that she was OK.  With the AV, when you set it in camera mode there was (for us) static that I did not want to listen to all the time.  Same is the case with the Ultra but since the setting is on the monitor I would just switch back to VOX once I knew all was well and not have to listen to the static.*The volume dial on the AV does not have numbers as the Ultra did.  With the Ultra I knew I wanted the volume at 3 or 4 but without the benefit of numbers on the AV it's a guessing game as to how loud it's going to be when she makes a noise.*Lots of interference/static.  There was static each time the scan switched the channel and sometimes just random static while on one channel.*The kicker, and ultimately why we had to return the item... we could see and hear another baby.  I live in a free standing house and the nearest baby to me is across a wide street and down a house so I assumed that was the baby I was seeing however I have now spoken with everyone on my block that has a baby in a crib and none of them have a video monitor so I have no idea whose baby I was seeing.  My best guess is that it's someone from one block over, behind my across the street neighbors.  That's pretty far away and even Mobi was surprised when I told them I thought I was seeing the baby just across the street.  FYI, Mobi also indicated that the interference and static I experienced was probably due to this other monitor so perhaps others would not have as much interference as I did.We decided to get a digital instead (which incidentally is also what Mobi suggested).  We didn't get the Mobi digital because my first issue above is still the case with that system.  So far I like the digital (even though it's more expensive) MUCH better than both the monitors I refer to above.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time
Reviews.Author: Stuck in Michigan "/T"
Reviews.Content: Terrible monitor.  Interference is unbearable.  The constant buzzing drove us mad.  To make it worse, the video in even low light conditions could only see about 5 feet.  Beyond 5 ft, you can only see shapes.  I bought it because of the possible web interface; however, the quality of the camera makes that impossible.I think we'll try the Levana next.

Reviews.Title: Not great
Reviews.Author: P. Feldman
Reviews.Content: The picture is unclear; especially at night and there is a great deal of interference.It is cheap, but you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Stuck in the Middle
Reviews.Author: Christine R. Woody
Reviews.Content: I have owned the Mobi Can for a month now, and have used it over the past two weeks for my four month old. The first week i was very impressed at the quality of picture it provided. My child has very bad reflux and it made me sleep easier knowing i could both see and hear him in his own bed. It helpedme evaluate when i really needed to go in and check on him, and when it was best to let him sooth himself to sleep. However, after about a week i noticed the camera was getting touch and i often had to go in and adjust it inorder for the picture to e clear. Then two night ago it just stoped working, Goes straight to a blue screen and provides no sound. So iam back to a regular monitor. I am hopefull I can sen it back and get a replacement quickly. I willalso say that the camera does not have very good range . You can not oput it up on a dresser and aim it down, and if your child kicks at all it willnot stay on the crib ledge. It does however stay with a little velcro :). Good theory just not sure if it really works yet. Stuck in the middle...... Hoping i just have a bad camera and the next will be great!Mobi MobiCam Audio Video Baby Monitoring System

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: L. Honda
Reviews.Content: I bought 2, and you can use the receivers with both cameras A and B. I also got the internet kit. Easy to use.Picture is good. Color during the day and black and white when using night vision. Nice output for TVs. Get a bunch of rechargable batteries though (it does not charge them). 6 AAs die in about 3 hours, then you need to take them out to recharge them. I hear the next version will have a charger built in. They also have plugs so you dont need batteries if you dont move around a lot.

Reviews.Title: Bad choice
Reviews.Author: Carlos D. Quintas
Reviews.Content: When we tryed to turn on the camera it doesn't work!!!! We return this item. We hope that Amazon give us a solution.

Reviews.Title: Great for caregivers also.
Reviews.Author: P. Coleman
Reviews.Content: My husband and I live next door to my 97 yr old Mother who is still mobile, lives alone and still able to cook her breakfast and do a little gardening.  The MobiCam helps us "watch" her in her living room & kitchen and saves lots of worrying about her and trips back and forth from our house to hers, and phone calls....a goodproduct for "old folks" like us who arelooking after older folks.

Reviews.Title: Good but could be better
Reviews.Author: taterty
Reviews.Content: I like this video monitor, it has good sound and good video.  The one thing I don't like is it doesn't have a rechargable battery like some other monitors.  It takes AA that only with last 4 hours.  It does have a wall plug which works but it makes it less portable.  The price was right.

Reviews.Title: MR
Reviews.Author: Milford K. Howard
Reviews.Content: This device did not work and the company took very long three weeks to send a replacement.  When it arrived it did not work.  Waitting on another replacement.

Reviews.Title: MobiCam Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: Erin Smith
Reviews.Content: This product is great.  If you are looking to save a little money on a video monitor this is definitely a great purchase.  It works perfectly.  There is a little interference sometimes but all you have to do to fix that is move it slightly and the interference goes away.  I love being able to turn off the screen at night and just have the audio part on.  I sleep better with no light in the room but I know if my baby makes a noise I can just flip the switch to turn the screen back on to check on him.  I can see him perfectly in the monitor.  I love it! :)

Reviews.Title: mid range product
Reviews.Author: Jon Cruikshank "jonpaul117"
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a basic monitor at a decent price then this is one to consider. Yes there is an occasional static issue but that will depend on what other wireless devices you have surrounded yourself with. The picture quality is decent depending on the light level of the room that the camera is in. The darker the room the less you will see. The unit has an excellent microphone which allows you to hear everything that is going on. The biggest negative towards this monitor is that it eats batteries quickly. Unless you have an endless supply of AA batteries to throw at it then this unit will have to be anchored to the nearest outlet.

Reviews.Title: Two Kids, Two Cameras
Reviews.Author: C. Fisher
Reviews.Content: Having two kids (a 6m and 2yr old) I wanted to find a video baby monitor with two cameras or at least one I could add a second camera to.  And I could not afford a highly expensive set.  This is a great camera set for the price.  Holds up well and so far no real noticable amount of interference from the million electronic gadgets that seem to liter our house.  I love that it automatically switches from camera to camera and love it even more that I can easily turn off this feature when only one of them is asleep.  All in all, well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 4 months!
Reviews.Author: V. Flood "Mom of two"
Reviews.Content: The signal was less than great when the we first used the system and then for no reason the display unit stopped working after 4 months of very occasional use.  Pick something else!

Reviews.Title: was ok at first
Reviews.Author: Briana Monks "bre"
Reviews.Content: it was fuzzy all the. we had to keep a big lamp on to see anything. and it always stayed in night vision no matter what we did. we're returning it and buying a normal monitor.

Reviews.Title: Audio Video Monitor
Reviews.Author: S. Guajardo
Reviews.Content: Great product. It's small enough to take to different rooms, the screen has good visibility and the audio is strong enough that I even hear our neighbors.

Reviews.Title: Not a fan
Reviews.Author: B. Clayton
Reviews.Content: I am definately not a fan. I bought this, and the picture was great, when it worked. I could only intermittenly get it to work, and that was 10% of the time. I did not like that the hand unit did not have lights that I could view baby activity when the sounds was down.I am returning, and getting a different one!

Reviews.Title: Mobicam a disappointment
Reviews.Author: Qawagamuie
Reviews.Content: Even after replacing my home cordless phone because of severe interference the range is very poor.  The video is excellent quality only if you are within about 30' of the camera.  The video is essentially useless out in the yard unless I am right outside a window where the camera is set up.  There is quite a lot of static even when I turn off the lcd screen and use it for audio only.  The unit requires so many batteries that clipping it on a pocket or belt loop doesn't really work because it is so heavy, which makes it inconvenient because you have to carry it around.  I have not tried the other video baby monitors, but imagine they are worth the extra $.Mobi MobiCam Audio Video Baby Monitoring System

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: Lisa B.
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor is a good choice for a second monitor or one at Grandma's house.  Works well in a three story house, even outside in the backyard.  The picture is clear and the volume works well.  The one disadvantage to this product, is that unlike the handheld video monitor from Summer, this one is not rechargeable.  You either must leave it plugged in all the time, or constantly replace the 6 AA batteries.  Additionally, the picture is VERY bright.  We used this a number of times at night and it was so bright, I had to turn the display off (a convenient feature), which defeats the purpose of having a video monitor.  But it works great at Grandma's house, and the price cannot be beat!

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: W. C. Eggleton
Reviews.Content: This monitor works very well.  The picture is clear and love the color and night time vision!

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Content: We bought the monitor 4 days ago;however, it is now unusable. The sound was poor and picture was fussy. The unit stopped working. We returned the monitor.

Reviews.Title: Average monitor
Reviews.Author: Orlando J. Berrios "OJB"
Reviews.Content: It is good but not when you have your neighbor with the same product. Sometimes we can see their baby, and sometimes they can see our baby. I don't think that is safe.

Reviews.Title: Great for toddlers and older children
Reviews.Author: Apple Scruff
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift, and have had a lot of fun with it. It was purchased for watching my newborn, but I mostly use it to spy on my toddler during his "nap" times. I would love to have the second camera to put in his play room as well so I don't have to keep moving the one camera I have.I have one complaint, which others have mentioned: The camera could use some kind of mounting device like a clip or a velcro ring. If I want to watch my baby, I have to rig something up to get just the right camera angle.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!! Must Have Item!
Reviews.Author: Happy Buyer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor for my nephew's baby shower a few months ago and he can't stop raving about how great this unit is. His wife absolutely loves how the easy the unit is to use as well as the clear picture. I am now considering buying the recommended internet kit so that they can view the baby from work. I definitely recommend this product to all parents.

Reviews.Title: Great video and Audio, but poor ergonomic design
Reviews.Author: C. Ambrosino "Cynd"
Reviews.Content: This one was the cheapest I bought. I got it at Walmart. It has great reception even in my WIFI home.  The cons are, it takes 6 AA batteries and they only last about 2 hours! It will not work with my rechargable batteries, which I purchased them for! Didn't come with wall mount, and the cord is too short to place very far from the wall outlet. The camera only moves up and down, limiting your ability to adjust the angles. There is NO video zoom, and unless to put it inside the crib, you can't see the babies eyes to tell if he is awake.  I works for a newborn-5months. It will be difficult to keep this camera out of reach of a baby because you have to keep it so close to the child to see them.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Military Mommy
Reviews.Content: This system is wonderful! The picture quality is great. I can check on my little man anytime and even see and hear his tiny breaths. I feel so secure with this system. I plan to buy this for my friends that are pregnant! Its totally worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great picture poor quality
Reviews.Author: D. Byrne
Reviews.Content: I just ordered this product and tried it out in the baby's room.He is not born yet but I had my husband in the baby's rooms room making some noise and I was in the bedroom with the monitor. At first it seemed to work good. Then I heard a high pitch static off and on. The screen went blank a few times but then came right back on. I even tried to change channels but didn't seem to do any good. The static wasn't too bad but bad enough were it was annoying. Then I changed room went into the kitchen and it worked ok then I went into the living room about 75 feet away from the baby's room and the static was really bad. I just wasn't that impressed so I sent it back for a refund and just ordered another video baby monitor. Hopefully this next one will work better. I do have to say the only thing I was impressed about was the quality of the picture. It was pretty good until it got static and then 1 time even turned black and white for about 10 seconds before turning back to color.

Reviews.Title: Mobi Video Monitoring System
Reviews.Author: A. Castro
Reviews.Content: I used it twice for 10 minute and the third time it broke. The screen on the monitor went blank. I sent it back for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: disappointed after a few weeks of use
Reviews.Author: arso00
Reviews.Content: We were very excited about the capacity of checking the image via internet and bought also the internet kit. We bought both products before our baby was born and testing it in the house was fine. We needed to contact the manufacturer to get some help to work in the internet and the "company" seems to be quite small.Now that the baby is born and we need it the most the statics make it impossible to keep the volume on during the night and the monitor didn't work all the time. Unfortunately we got very disappointed with the performance of the camera and decided to return as a defective product, not taking the risk of getting a replacement. We have just returned it so I can't say how that was handled yet.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: penname
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for a friend, Makes no since for me to write a review but amazon wont stop emailing me until i do

Reviews.Title: Monitor is nothing but a HEADACHE!
Reviews.Author: Brittney Krueger
Reviews.Content: thought this monitor would be great but i end up going to check on baby more often than i would have w/out it! It completly shuts itself off..full of static and there is nothing by it to interfere with it and now the screen has gone completly white and i can not even see my baby now!! and 100 dollars is not a cheap price for something that works so terrible and we have only had it 3 months and really only used it in the last month!!! please dont get this monitor i havent slept in months b/c of it!!

Reviews.Title: Cheapo Monitor
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Hartwig "dancin' mommy"
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this monitor. I also bought an additional camera so that I could monitor both of my children in their rooms at the same time. There's a constant static sound in the background. You have to be looking at the receiver exactly straight on or you can't see the picture (kind of like a laptop, but much worse), the night vision is terrible, the sound is tinny, and it can't be mounted on the wall directly above the baby's crib b/c the camera doesn't swivel down far enough to see below it. Worst of all, when you have it on scan mode to watch both rooms at once, there is a loud clicking noise each time it switches. I had to go back to my old monitors because I couldn't sleep with that thing clicking every 4 seconds.I'm returning this useless thing ASAP.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied
Reviews.Author: D. Grenham
Reviews.Content: I'm very disappointed in this product. Battery life is terrible, and video signal is extremely weak - literally have to be in next room or forget it, you will keep losing signal. The camera image is fine but the movement and flexibility of the camera itself is flawed - you practically have to mount it on the ceiling to get a good view of a crib.Not happy - I'm going back to my old one.

Reviews.Title: Faulty design
Reviews.Author: Sara Katz
Reviews.Content: the camera pivots all the way up but only down slightly, so no matter how hard you try of you r placeing this camera on the top of the crib it cant pivot low enough to see the baby. poorly designed

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM
Reviews.Author: Jason Tempel
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace the Summer video monitor as it was old and needed replacing. I have had it for 2 days now and it doesn't go more then 25 feet out of my 2yr olds room. I tried to hook it up to the internet software as well and the infared doesn't work nearly as well as my Summer I have. You can't see her at all. This is not worth your money I would go back to the Summer one I have.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I like this monitor a lot but I wish the battery life was longer (it lasts for about 4 hours) and it gets staticky when I move around it, which gets annoying. But it works, the picture is good and the volume is great.

Reviews.Title: Video Quality Poor (very blurry)
Reviews.Author: dd "dd"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product purely on reading reviews from Amazon and I wish I had done more research.  I was very interested in a 900mhz video monitor, one that would not interfere w/ my 2.4ghz internet router....  Well, needless to say, I am returning this product only after 10 minutes of use.  Video strength was fine, but the video quality was poor.  It was very blurry, nothing like what the advertisements looked like on the box and/or web sites.  Perhaps I received a damaged or defective item, regardless, I am not interested in a replacement item and/or trying another item from this manufacturer.  Hope this review helped.
